articles.title: Deadline
articles.text: April 2018 student visa application is now over. Application for other visa holders si till possible until March 2nd .

articles.title: Student Blog
articles.text:
We now have a [student blog](https://medium.com/all-about-kyoto) in 3 languages featuring all kinds of information about Kyoto.

* [English](https://medium.com/all-about-kyoto/tagged/nihongo-center-eng)
* [French](https://medium.com/all-about-kyoto/tagged/nihongo-center-fr)
* [Taiwanese](https://medium.com/all-about-kyoto/tagged/nihongo-center-twn)
